PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceFireSafetyRequirements
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties related to fire protection of spaces that apply to the occurrences of IfcSpace or IfcZone.

PropertyDef.Name: MainFireUse
PropertyDef.Definition: Main fire use for the space which is assigned from the fire use classification table as given by the relevant national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: AncillaryFireUse
PropertyDef.Definition: Ancillary fire use for the space which is assigned from the fire use classification table as given by the relevant national building code.

PropertyDef.Name: FireRiskFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire Risk factor assigned to the space according to local building regulations.

PropertyDef.Name: FireHazardFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire hazard code of the space. The coding depends on the national fire safety regulations.

PropertyDef.Name: FlammableStorage
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the space is intended to serve as a storage of flammable material (which is regarded as such by the presiding building code. (TRUE) indicates yes, (FALSE) otherwise.

PropertyDef.Name: FireExit
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this object is designed to serve as an exit in the case of fire (TRUE) or not (FALSE). Here whether the space (in case of e.g., a corridor) is designed to serve as an exit space, e.g., for fire escape purposes.

PropertyDef.Name: SprinklerProtection
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the space is sprinkler protected (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: SprinklerProtectionAutomatic
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the space has an automatic sprinkler protection (TRUE) or not (FALSE). It should only be given, if the property "SprinklerProtection" is set to TRUE.

PropertyDef.Name: AirPressurization
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the space is required to have pressurized air (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
